Class JsonWebTokenKeyManager

java.lang.Object
io.fusion.air.microservice.security.JsonWebTokenKeyManager
@Service public final class JsonWebTokenKeyManager extends Object
JsonWebToken Key Manager Loads Secret Key, Public Keys depends upon the configuration.
Author:
arafkarsh

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    JsonWebTokenKeyManager()
    Initialize the JWT with the Signature Algorithm based on Secret Key or Public / Private Key

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    String
    getIssuer()
    Returns the Issuer
    Key
    getKey()
    Returns the Signing Key
    Key
    getValidatorKey()
    Returns KeyCloak Validator (Public) Key
    Key
    getValidatorLocalKey()
    Returns Validator Local Key
    JsonWebTokenKeyManager
    init()
    Initialize the JsonWebToken with Token Type Secret Keys and other default claims settings.
    JsonWebTokenKeyManager
    init(int _tokenType)
    Initialize the JsonWebToken with Token Type (Secret or Public/Private Keys) and other default claims settings.
    JsonWebTokenKeyManager
    setIssuer(String _issuer)
    Set the Issuer
    void
    setKeyCloakPublicKey()
    This is set when the Applications Boots Up from the Servlet Event Listener Servlet Event Listener ensures that the public key is downloaded from the KeyCloak Server Set the Validator Key as KeyCloak Public Key if the Public Key downloaded from KeyCloak.

    • setKeyCloakPublicKey

      public void setKeyCloakPublicKey()
      This is set when the Applications Boots Up from the Servlet Event Listener Servlet Event Listener ensures that the public key is downloaded from the KeyCloak Server Set the Validator Key as KeyCloak Public Key if the Public Key downloaded from KeyCloak.
